data.nrql: SELECT PERCENTAGE(COUNT(*), WHERE (cpu_utilization IS NULL OR cpu_utilization < 85) AND (status IS NULL OR status = 'RUNNING')) AS 'Health Score' FROM google_computeengine_instance FACET google_computeengine_instance_name
SELECT uniqueCount(google_computeengine_instance_name) AS 'Instances' FROM google_computeengine_instance FACET machine_type

presentation.title: Machine Type Distribution
presentation.notes: Full or partial URL of the machine type resource used for this instance.

data.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(google_computeengine_instance_name) AS 'Instances' FROM google_computeengine_instance FACET zone

presentation.title: Zone Distribution
presentation.notes: URL of the zone where the instance resides.

data.nrql: SELECT average(cpu_utilization) FROM google_computeengine_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: CPU Utilization (Percent)
presentation.notes: The fraction of the allocated CPU that is currently in use on the instance.

data.nrql: SELECT average(received_throughput) FROM google_computeengine_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Received Throughput (Bytes)
presentation.notes: Delta count of bytes received from the network.

data.nrql: SELECT average(sent_throughput) FROM google_computeengine_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Sent Throughput (Bytes)
presentation.notes: Delta count of bytes sent over the network.
